Case# NSBrowser.ColumnResizingType.noColumnResizing

macOS

```
case noColumnResizing
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/appkit/nsbrowser/columnresizingtype-swift.enum/nocolumnresizing#Discussion)

Neither `NSBrowser` nor the user can change the column width. The developer must explicitly set all column widths.
